issues_actions.issue: Cannot access email on mobile device
issues_actions.description: User cannot sync email to their smartphone or tablet
actions: Check email settings on device (server, port, security)
Verify internet connectivity on mobile device
Restart email app and try again
Remove and re-add email account
Check if email account is locked or suspended

issues_actions.description: Office printer shows offline or won't print documents
actions: Check printer power and cable connections
Verify network connection (WiFi or Ethernet)
Restart print spooler service on computer
Update or reinstall printer drivers
Clear print queue and try printing again

issues_actions.description: Application installation process stops with error message
actions: Run installer as administrator
Check system requirements (RAM, disk space, OS version)
Clear temporary files and restart computer
Disable antivirus temporarily during installation
Download fresh installer from official source

issues_actions.description: Unable to connect to company VPN or connection drops frequently
actions: Check internet connection stability
Verify VPN credentials (username, password)
Try different VPN server locations
Update VPN client software
Check firewall and antivirus settings

issues_actions.description: User cannot reset password through normal process
actions: Check if reset email is in spam/junk folder
Verify correct email address is associated with account
Try different browser or clear browser cache
Wait 24 hours and try again (rate limiting)
Contact administrator for manual password reset

issues_actions.description: Cannot access shared folders or files on network drive
actions: Check user permissions for the specific folder
Verify network drive is properly mapped
Try accessing with UNC path (\\server\share)
Clear cached credentials and re-authenticate
Contact IT to verify group membership

issues_actions.description: Cannot hear others or others cannot hear user in Teams calls
actions: Check microphone and speaker permissions in Teams
Test audio devices in Teams settings
Update audio drivers on computer
Close other applications using audio devices
Try using Teams in web browser instead of app

issues_actions.description: System performance is degraded, applications take long to load
actions: Check available disk space (should be >15% free)
Run disk cleanup to remove temporary files
Check for malware using Windows Defender
Disable unnecessary startup programs
Add more RAM if consistently using >80%
